TopicTitle: Staging Informtion [left side on Launch Pad] Missing

Articles.Content: What would cause the staging information on a rocket that goes above 1 stage to be pushed off to the left?   What I mean, is  that I cannot see the staging information, but if I activate an engine, I can see 1/2 of that information appearing.. as if the staging was push over to the left.
Have you changed your screen resolution recently? Do you play in windowed mode? It sounds like the resolution is too high for the window the game is running in.

Hi there @ExplorerKlatt , I will try that, but I can launch a rocket and listen for the fuel to run out. and then stage and then magically the staging information appears for the last stage.

I should also point out that this career is about 1 month old in real time.

Edited February 26, 2016 by gamerscircle

I visited my 1 week back up and the staging issue isn't there.  I suspect the save file got munged, sure wish there was a way to really understand though files and be able to find the problem and fix them.
